I am an associate professor at the Johns Hopkins Carey Business School.

I study social networks and how they shape the individual socioeconomic outcome. 

I have a PhD in Economics from [University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign](https://economics.illinois.edu) and a Master of Arts in Economics from [New York University](https://as.nyu.edu/econ.html) and a Laurea in Economia Politica from [Bocconi University](https://www.unibocconi.eu/)
